events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but the package still hasn't arrived and the tracking info hasn't updated.
Customer issue classified under the Delivery Delay cluster based on the tracking delay described.
Support agent Mike assigned to handle the customer's delivery delay inquiry.
Hello, this is Mike from customer support. I’m looking into the status of your delayed shipment.
Could you please provide me with your order number so I can check the shipping details more precisely?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I’ve been checking daily but there are no new tracking updates.
Thank you for the info. I’ve contacted the shipping provider to investigate the delay and will update you shortly.
I appreciate your quick reply and the efforts to get more information on my shipment status.
Since the shipment still has no update, the case is escalated to the logistics manager for priority handling.
The package was located by the carrier and is now en route with guaranteed delivery tomorrow.
Just checking in to confirm you received your order and that everything arrived as expected.
Yes, the package arrived safely today. Thank you for all your help resolving this delay.
Closing the case as the delivery delay issue was resolved to the customer's satisfaction.
